name: quick and cozy baskets
sizes_available: large: diameter 8 inches (20 cm) x height 4 inches (10 cm) and small: diameter 6 inches (15 cm) x height 3 inches (7,5 cm)
notes:
these crochet baskets are quick, fun, and practical! made with super bulky yarn, they work up fast and hold their shape beautifully. the pattern includes two sizes—a smaller basket without handles and a slightly larger one with handles. they’re perfect for organizing your space, storing yarn, or adding a cozy handmade touch to your home. you can easily adjust the height or width to suit your needs. whether for storage or decor, these baskets are as functional as they are cute!

more details and the free pattern: https://mycrochetspace.com/crochet-basket-pattern/
